attributes.action: Reduce the cost of water in the South West and bring it in line with inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Water charges have risen by more than 55% in two years in the South West.  This is way above the cost of inflation.  South West waters answer is for us to all go onto meters...but this is not always the economical solution!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
